mapper.insert: insert into tb_user values( #{ userId }, #{ password }, #{ email }, #{ birthDay }, #{ phone }, #{ address }, default )
mapper.select: select * from tb_user where user_id = #{ userId }
mapper.update: update "user" set user_pwd = #{ password }, user_email = #{ email }, user_birth_date = #{ birthDay }, user_phone = #{ phone }, user_local = #{ address } where user_id = #{ userId }
